text: -Where so quickly, little brother? Why do you run like this? - I'm going to hide, my little brother. - Why? -The king of the jungle has just ordered all the elephants to be killed. - Yes, but you're a monkey, not an elephant! - Yes, but while you are discovering it, I will be aching. (And it continued to run) FIN
title: El mono y el tejón
author: Alfonso Reyes
